pageTitle: Free People Collar Button Down Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 25in / 64.5cm MEASUREMENTS Bottom layer sold separately. Imported. Wash cold. 100% polyester. Fabric: Textured gauze. Small slits at the front and back lend a fun and easy silhouette to this faded gauze blouse from Free People. The button closure begins at the fold-over collar and ends at the shirttail hem. Textured panels construct the sides, and a patch pocket is placed at the front. Sheer. Description Sale > Free People > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The Free People story begins in the 1970s, when founder Dick Hayne opened the brand’s first brick-and-mortar store in West Philadelphia. Over time, the eclectic label evolved into Urban Outfitters, but later, in 1984, Free People was relaunched as its own entity. Designed with a romantic, adventurous aesthetic, Free People caters to a contemporary bohemian lifestyle, highlighting creative spirit and effortless confidence with a unique do-it-yourself sensibility.
